archimate:Capability.name: Profiling and authorizations
archimate:Capability.documentation: It allows to manage and check the Digital platform access privileges (rights, powers and delegations) granted to each profile an authenticated user, program, or process belongs. Access privileges can be defined in terms of capabilities, functionalities, API/Service or data. Different capabilities or instances can be used to manage authorization process for different type of users (i.e. customers, employee and partners)
